author: Keith Wagstaff
title: No, your brain isn't 'too busy' for meditation
description: March Mindfulness is Mashable's series that examines the intersection of meditation practice and technology. Because even in the time of coronavirus, March doesn't have to be madness. My mind is too active to meditate. Too busy. There's too much going on. Tho…
content:
March Mindfulness is Mashable's series that examines the intersection of meditation practice and technology. Because even in the time of coronavirus, March doesn't have to be madness. 
My mind is too active to meditate. Too busy. There's too much going on. … [+3080 chars]
